rukus.text: Ratri (tahajjudacya namajasathi) uthuna ubhe raha, parantu thoda vela
Ardhi ratra kinva tyapeksahi kahi kami
Kinva tyavara vadhavuna ani kura'anace thode thambuna thambuna (spastatah) pathana kara
Nihsansaya, amhi tumacyavara eka bharadasta gosta lavakaraca avatarita karu
Nihsansaya, ratrice uthane manacya ekagratekarita phara yogya ahe ani kathanasa mothe durusta (ucita) karanare ahe
Niscitaca, divasa tumhala aneka kame asatata
Ani tumhi apalya palanakartyace namahsmarana karita ja ani sampurna srsti (nirmiti) pasuna alaga ho'una tyacyakade dhyanamagna vha
Purva ani pascimeca svami, jyacyakherija konihi upasya nahi. Tumhi tyalaca apala karyasadhaka (va sanraksaka) banava
Ani je kahi te sangatata, tumhi te sahana karita raha ani tyanna cangalya prakare soduna dya
Ani mala va tya khote tharavinarya susampanna lokanna soduna dya, ani tyanna thodi savada dya
Nihsansaya, amacyajavala kathora bedya aheta, ani dhagadhaga petata asaleli jahannama ahe
Ani galyata adakanare jevana ahe ani duhkhadayaka azaba ahe
Jya divasi dharati ani parvata kampita hotila ani parvata bhurabhurita valucya tekadyansarakhe hotila
Nihsansaya, amhi tumacyakad'ehi tumacyavara saksa denara paigambara pathavila ahe, jasa amhi phira'aunakade rasula (paigambara) pathavila hota
Tevha phira'aunane tya paigambaraci avajna keli tara amhi tyala ghora sankatata dharale
Tumhi jara inkari rahala tara tya divasi kase suraksita rahala, jo divasa lahana balakanna vrd'dha karuna takila
Jya divasi akasa vidirna ho'ila, allahaca ha vayada purna jhalyasivaya rahanara nahi
Nihsansaya, ha bodha (upadesa) ahe, tevha jo icchila tyane apalya palanakartyakade (janya) ca marga patkarava
